rules.text: My income exceeded $200,000 ($300,000 joint) for the last two years
My net worth exceeds $1 million (excluding primary residence)
I hold a Series 7, 65, or 82 license

US.note: You may be asked to upload documentation before investing.

SG.note: You may be asked to upload documentation before investing.

rules.text: Net assets of at least £250,000 (excluding primary residence)

GB.note: You may be asked to upload documentation before investing.

rules.text: Annual income of at least CAD $200,000 (or CAD $300,000 with spouse)
Net assets of at least CAD $1 million (excluding primary residence)
Financial assets of at least CAD $1 million

CA.note: You may be asked to upload documentation before investing.
